Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Wakeforest Drive, between the Citadel and Oceancrest Ministries.
Room.LongDescription: The North Oceancrest Ministry Building is located on the west side of the road, and consists of the Ministry of Tranquility, the Ministry of Rumor Control and the Hall of Discipline. The entrance to the Ministries is located along Ministry Way, located one block to the west.
